name: Pixel Park
description:
Pixel Park is color by numbers app that will bring hours of enjoyment. With an extensive library of 1300+ free images, you will have no shortage of what to color. Improve focus, develop fine motor skills, and just have fun.

Features:

- Massive collection of over 1300 images for adults and kids alike.
- Including animals, flowers, food, holidays, characters, buildings, etc.
- Instant sharing on social networks, email, and more.
- Unlock image templates when you complete an image.
- Create your own pixel art masterpieces with the editor.
- Construct creative scenes with multiple textures and shapes.
- Tools like the magic wand, magnifying glass, and eraser.
- Supports 6 Languages.
- No subscriptions... ever.

How to play:

- Use two fingers to scale an image larger until boxes with numbers inside them appear.
- Choose a color in the color palette and tap the boxes that correspond to that color.
- To enable magnifying glass, long press anywhere on the screen.

Using shapes:

- Open the shapes menu by double tapping any color.
- Select a shape by tapping it.
- Remove a shape by double tapping any shape in the shape menu.
- Close the shapes bar by tapping any color.
